title: BBC Local Live: Oxfordshire on Monday 21 November 2016 - BBC News
summary: rise in complaints about noisy students .
oxford united striker wes thomas to miss rest of season .

documents.title: that 's all from us
text: thanks for joining us today , we 'll be with you again at 08:00 tomorrow .
do n't forget to stay in touch and follow oxfordshire 's latest news , sports and weather on facebook , twitter and email .

documents.title: experimental skin graft from world war two 'as good as today 's operations '
text: what was it like getting plastic surgery during the second world war ?
well that 's something explored by the aptly named `` guinea pig club '' - a group of raf veterans who had experimental plastic surgery for burns .
radio oxford spoke to club secretary jack perry , whose skin graft was so good `` it could not be improved in this day and age '' .
author: Alex Regan
South Online

documents.title: cctv images released of cowley road sex assault suspect
text: cctv images have been released of a man thought to have sexually assaulted a 20-year-old woman at the o2 academy in cowley road .
the incident took place on 3 november on the ground floor dance floor at about 01:30 .
the man is described at in his late teen of mid-20s , medium build with mousy-coloured hair with a quiff and short sides .

documents.title: travel update : delays on a34 southbound and m40 northbound
text: travel update : delays on a34 southbound and m40 northbound
author: Al Ryan
BBC Oxford travel presenter

documents.title: firefighters tackle arson attack in banbury
text: a blaze in an outbuilding in banbury is being treated as arson by fire scene investigators .
two fire engines attended moulds crescent at about 1:00 on monday after a neighbour called the brigade .
crew manager mike aspinal said : `` whilst no-one was injured significant damage was done to personal property . ''

documents.title: breakingfurther flood warnings for west oxfordshire
text: the environment agency has issued more warnings for the river evenlode and the river glyme , affected towns , which could affect villages across west oxfordshire .
people living in the following areas have been told to prepare for flooding :

here 's our latest update so you can prepare for your journey home :

BBC Oxford travel presenter

documents.title: breakingflood warning for oxfordshire river
text: the environment agency has issued a flood alert for the upper river great ouse , which runs close to somerton in the cherwell valley .
residents have been advised to protect their properties due to further rainfall this evening and tuesday morning .

documents.title: weather outlook : strong winds
text: weather outlook : strong winds
author: Holly Green
BBC Weather

documents.title: cyclist murder accused bailed
text: a man charged with the murder of a cyclist in oxford has been bailed until 2 december .
eamonn anderson , 56 , was assaulted in the city 's high street on 25 october and later died in hospital .
iman st clair , 18 , of kestrel crescent , oxford , appeared at oxford crown court on monday .
an 18-year-old man and 17-year-old boy , both from oxford , were also arrested on sus of murder and have been bailed until january next year .
author: Rahil Sheikh
BBC News Oxford

documents.title: 'desperately needed ' aid for refugees
text: around 20 tonnes of humanitarian aid is to be shipped to uganda by an oxfordshire charity .
oxfam 's aid shipment includes water tanks and equipment for water purification .
it will be used in the refugee camp bidibidi in north west uganda , where thousands of people have fled to from south sudan .
the charity said it is increasing its work there to meet the needs of the growing number of refugees .

every week , the conflict in south sudan is pushing over 2,500 new refugees , mostly women and children , to leave their country and seek sanctuary in bidibidi where more facilities are desperately needed .
author: Rahil Sheikh
BBC News Oxford

documents.title: dogs used to help people living with autism trialed
text: dogs are being used to help adults with autism in oxfordshire .
dogs for good has already trialed a scheme in berkshire and is now partnering with wallingford charity style acre .
author: Rahil Sheikh
BBC News Oxford

documents.title: scandinavia challenge complete
text: a banbury woman who ran the length of scandinavia for charity has made it home .
sophie rooney 's almost 3,000km-trek took her through norway , sweden and denmark .
i 've been running everyday since i got back and people keep telling me i should stop now

documents.title: witnesses sought after daylight robbery of woman in cowley
text: police are searching for witnesses after a woman was robbed by a man in cowley .
the robbery happened at 9:50 on 12 november on the footpath between templars square and beauchamp lane .
a thin man , in his 20s , pushed the victim , grabbed a bag , and rustled through it before taking cash out of her purse .
police are looking for a man who is around 6ft 2in ( 189cm ) .
he was carrying a black plastic bag and was wearing a black tracksuit and hoodie , with the hoot up .

documents.title: the u 's striker expected to be out on injury for rest of season
text: # oufc oxford united expect striker wes thomas to miss rest of season after rupturing achilles .
skarz unavailable tues following concussion

text: oxford 's thomas ruled out for season

documents.title: majority of reported crime unsolved
text: more than 80 % of crimes reported in oxford during the first half of the year have not been solved by police , the oxford mail can reveal .
an investigation by the mail found of 6,791 crimes reported from january to the end of june , 5,599 of them have been recorded as 'unsolved ' .
author: Oxford Mail

documents.title: firefighters use mannequin challenge to drive point home
text: firefighters use mannequin challenge to drive point home

documents.title: man charged with fraud
text: a man 's been charged with fraud after a resident from drayton was conned out of a 'substantial ' amount of money .
nahiyan choudhury , 21 , from camden , is charged with conspiring with others to acquire , use or possess criminal property .
choudhury is due to appear at oxford magistrates ' court on 20 december .

documents.title: autumn statement : expressway announced
text: a total of £ 27 million has been earmarked to develop an expressway linking oxford to milton keynes and cambridge .
it 's part of a £ 1 billion investment across the whole country expected to be formally announced during wednesday 's autumn statement .

documents.title: complaints about noisy students rise
text: east oxford residents have been complaining about the behaviour of oxford brookes students on nights out .
students could face disciplinary action according to a letter seen by the bbc .

documents.title: oxfordshire 's weather : heavy and prolonged rain
text: rain will be heavy and prolonged today .
later some bright intervals may develop , but thundery showers are also expected this afternoon .
highs of 11c .

text: the sun may shine again , as demonstrated by this blissful of the thames at godstow , taken by xuguang liu , at the end of last week

documents.title: happy monday
text: good morning and yuck !
it 's a grim old day , but we 've made it - wet , soggy and chilled to our bones - to bbc oxford towers to bring you all the latest news , travel and weather from across the county .
